entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
